parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Converts position from [[PositionAGL]] to [[PositionASL]].

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[AGLToASL]] posAGL

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> posAGL: [[PositionAGL]] - position to convert

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[PositionASL]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_playerPosASL = [[AGLToASL]] ([[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [0,0,0]);</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_camPosASL = [[AGLToASL]] [[positionCameraToWorld]] [0,0,0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ASLToAGL]], [[ASLToATL]], [[ATLToASL]], [[getPos]], [[getPosATL]], [[getPosASL]]
</value></part></template></root>
